/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11  -Wall -W -O3 -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/test_line3d.dir/line3d_test.cpp.o  -o ../../../bin/test_line3d -rdynamic ../../../lib/libg2o_types_slam3d_addons.so ../../../lib/libg2o_types_slam3d.so ../../../lib/libg2o_opengl_helper.so -lGLU -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lGL ../../../lib/libg2o_core.so ../../../lib/libg2o_stuff.so -lrt -Wl,-rpath,/home/amsl/AMSL_ros_pkg/mapping/my_g2o/lib
